game.name: The King Feasts First
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The King Feasts First is a cozy, whimsical arcade tavern game for 1–2 players. Prepare your inn for the day, serve quirky factions, and adapt to surprising events — from golden eggs to wars shaking the realm. Keep your reputation high and prove your tavern is fit for a king!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The King Feasts First is a cozy, whimsical arcade tavern game for 1–2 players. Prepare your inn for the day, serve quirky factions, and adapt to surprising events — from golden eggs to wars shaking the realm. Keep your reputation high and prove your tavern is fit for a king!
